alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 8:40PM CST until December 15 at 9:30PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR CENTRAL CLAYTON...EASTERN ALLAMAKEE...SOUTHWESTERN VERNON... CENTRAL GRANT AND CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 840 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Albin to near Edgewood, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Lansing around 845 PM CST. Guttenberg around 855 PM CST. Viroqua and Cassville around 900 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eastman, Giard, Turkey River, National, Retreat, Fargo and Effigy Mounds. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northeastern Iowa...southeastern Minnesota...and southwestern Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
